name: Domino Score Card
description:
This is not another game of dominoes, but is an application to record the results of one or more games and can be used to record the results of team games.

Allows you to record the results of each round, automatically summarize each round and notifies the winners when the preset score has been achieved. Results are saved up to 15 games, showing the ranking of each player at the end of the game.

Take time each of each round, you can pause and continue the game at any time.

Create teams of players as you like or at random. Besides you select how many points a game ends.

Change the background with 4 beautiful images.
